longBusinessSummary: BlueRiver Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or related business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to identify business opportunities in the field of technology, media, telecom, and entertainment industries. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in San Antonio, Texas.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Eric  Medina
companyOfficers.title: MD, Head of Fin. & Corp. Devel.
